name: Throw Throw Dino Dino
description:
Throw Throw Dino Dino is a game about a group of dino trying to get as far as possible. Fly trough different biomes and bounce your way up to the future!

Controls:

  • Hold spacebar to charge, release to launch.
  • Press P to pause and resume
  • Press R to restart

This game was made in a weekend for the Open Jam 2020. The theme of the jam was "Airborne". The code is available on Github. We used MonoGame 3.8 with Nez for the coding part, and Aseprite to create the assets.

Credits:

  • Design and code by Drarig29, Rubidium and Rouli
  • Visuals by Rouli
  • Music: Back in the background by Anttis Instrumental
  • Sound effects and music were taken from gamesounds.xyz, a royalty free library of music and sounds

Here's the live tweet thread of the process.

Thank you for playing!
